Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-47913 affecting package docker-compose for versions less than 2.27.0-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-47913 affecting package docker-compose for versions less than 2.27.0-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package docker-compose is earlier than 2.27.0-6, affected by CVE-2025-47913
